Container.Name: picthor.io

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Picthor is listening on port 5000 by default, map it to an available port on your unraid server

Config.Name: Cache path
Config.Description: This is the place where all the generated thumbs and other cache files will be placed. Fast SSD is preferable.

Config.Name: Root directory path
Config.Description: Root path example where you should mount your photos library folder. Use this path when you will be adding a root dir in the web ui. Read only access mode is recommend.

Config.Name: Web address
Config.Description: The url of your picthor installation. Usually: http://<your unraid ip>:<picthor web ui port>

Config.Name: PICTHOR_CACHE_DIR
Config.Description: Container path to cache dir. This should match the mapped
